opponent.label: Gloria
opponent.artist: MyMainAccIsANord (poses, model tweaks) , Halo (model) , RinkahBestGirl (poses) , Mike (strip pose contribution) , AriaSakata (summer outfit base)
opponent.description: Gloria is the female player character in Pokémon Sword and Shield. A sassy young lass from the county town of Postwick in the Galar region. Loves camping and curry.
